Node.definition: = state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= man; ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► friend of David (דָּוִד)

= town, possibly to be identified with Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► place where someone's concubine (פִּילֶגֶשׁ) was raped by a large group of men; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

Node.gloss: to let go|to dismiss|to send (someone) on his way|to free|to release

= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= man; ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► friend of David (דָּוִד)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of ethnic group; ◄ descendant of Eber (עֵבֶר)

= process by which humans become repulsive or loathsome to someone else ◄ as a result of antagonistic actions ► resulting in enmity between the parties involved

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= soldier riding a horse

= minute fragments; ◄ resulting from wearing down of esp. siliceous rocks and found covering parts of the sea shore, river beds, deserts, etc.; ► contains materials for the production of dye and glass; ≈ symbol of large quantity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= area that is located to the east of an object
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a state in which humans experience extreme anxiety, ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances, as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= action by which humans go to a location where they will not be readily seen by others; ► in order to be safe from danger or to attack someone else
= a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place
= plant with thorns; ► useless; ≈ regarded as ugly and useless|meaning unsure; possibly: = hole in the ground or clump of bushes; ► can be used as hiding place
= underground space ► used as hiding place

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= member of ethnic group; ◄ descendant of Eber (עֵבֶר)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= state/process by which humans experience a strong fear, usually accompanied by shaking and trembling
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a fixed point in time for a particular event
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
literally: head; hence: = a sub division of a larger unit that is divided into multiple parts
literally: head; hence: = a sub division of a larger unit that is divided into multiple parts
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= location; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= region or district; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
literally: head; hence: = a sub division of a larger unit that is divided into multiple parts
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= a town with two locations (Upper Beth Horon and Lower Beth Horon); ◄ in the territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קְהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
literally: head; hence: = a sub division of a larger unit that is divided into multiple parts
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= member of ethnic group; ◄ descendant of Eber (עֵבֶר)
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
literally: to hammer; hence: = causative action by which humans use an iron tool to cause an object to have a thin cutting edge, ► in order to make it useful and effective as a tool

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= triangular blade ◄ made of metal (bronze (נְחֹשֶׁת) or iron (בַּרְזֶל) and part of a larger contraption ► used for breaking the soil to make it ready for cultivation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= wooden handle with a metal blade, sharpened on one face, perpendicular to the handle; ► used for cutting down trees and shaping timber

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15 20 centimeters); ► used for cutting grain|= triangular blade ◄ made of metal (bronze (נְחֹשֶׁת) or iron (בַּרְזֶל) and part of a larger contraption ► used for breaking the soil to make it ready for cultivation
= triangular blade ◄ made of metal (bronze (נְחֹשֶׁת) or iron (בַּרְזֶל) and part of a larger contraption ► used for breaking the soil to make it ready for cultivation
exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

exact meaning unsure; possibly: = iron head consisting of two or three pointed prongs attached to the end of a wooden handle, approximately 1 1.3 meters in length; ► used by farmers and field workers to lift piles of cuttings
= wooden handle with a metal blade, sharpened on one face, perpendicular to the handle; ► used for cutting down trees and shaping timber

Node.gloss: to cause to stand|to set (up)|to put|to place
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause a person, animal or inanimate object to be in a certain location, usually in an upright position
= iron tip of a goad (מַלְמַד)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► friend of David (דָּוִד)
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► friend of David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= a place where it is most practical to cross a mountain range
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
